Hi Prasen:

From what I have read, it doesn't matter how you configure the =
politeness of a BdbFrontier frontier, it will only ever put one URL per hos=
t onto the Queue for the ToeThreads to process.

To do what you describe, y=
ou will need to use a different Frontier class that will put more than one =
URL per host onto the Queue at any given time.  Unfortunately, I don't thin=
k there is such a Frontier class at this time.  

Gordon Paynter (i.e. the =
other Gordon; not to be confused with the Gordon who knows what he is talki=
ng about).
